I'm currently focused on completing a computer graphics course that covers a great portion of 3D design. The course is run by VISSCHOOL.RU and after it is completed, a certificate from AutoDesk is obtained.
PROFESSIONAL RESUME:
Aware and innovative 3D Modeler with good commercial and artistic inclinations. I can work alone or as part of an artistic team. I can address many ongoing projects with full attention to detail and quality. My knowledge includes designing and delivering creative projects and services from the concept to the end product. With my skills in computer software I am able to make impeccable 3D special effects. With my ability to cooperate effectively with clients, colleagues and management teams, I am convinced that I can be useful in any project of this nature. Software used by me: 3DS Max, ZBrush, Substance Painter, Substance Designer, Adobe Photoshop, Adobe After Effects, SpeedTree, Marvelous Designer, 3D-Coat, UnrealEngine. The knowledge and application of these products, as well as the drive for adaptability to new software products, allows me to develop interior design, environment and characters for the gaming industry.
